Name: Guard Collar
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Fighting-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Skitty and Delcatty.  You can get a Guard Collar at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Delcat-Hair, a Delcat-Fang, and a Prim Pebble. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
